"Task Guide Information":
"To check the tasks you have been assigned, open the Main Menu with , select \"Tasks/Quest\", then select \"Tasks\".

After selecting a Task trom the Task List, select \"Display Guide Information\" to display a guide that shows your destination and any target enemies."

"You do not need to have \"Display Guide Information\" selected to complete a Task. Completing its listed objectives is enough.
